text: True Friends (Russian: Верные друзья) is a 1954 Russian adventure comedy movie directed by Mikhail Kalatozov and starring Vasili Merkuryev, Nikolay Smorchkov, Boris Chirkov, Aleksandr Borisov, Alexey Gribov, Lyudmila Shagalova. It was distributed by Mosfilm. ==Other websites== * Category:1954 comedy movies Category:1954 adventure movies Category:Russian comedy movies Category:Movies directed by Mikhail Kalatozov
title: True Friends (movie)
